properties.areaDesc: S of Currituck Beach Light NC to Oregon Inlet NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 10:02PM EST until January 4 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
...GUSTY WINDS AND HAZARDOUS SEAS DEVELOPING TOMORROW MORNING AND
CONTINUING INTO THIS WEEKEND...

.A strong cold front will approach the region Friday night and
pass through Saturday. Southwest winds will increase to 20 to
30 knots on Friday, becoming west to northwest and increasing to
30 to 40 knots behind the front Saturday night into Sunday
morning.

* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and
seas 4 to 6 feet expected. Stronger winds and seas likely by
Sunday morning.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Duck to Oregon Inlet.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Friday to 2 AM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM FRIDAY TO 2 AM EST SATURDAY
